title: Aloo gobi and jeera rice
description: This hearty cauliflower and potato dish is one of the most common vegetable curries you will find in India. Serve with the spiced jeera rice for a cheap, filling and vegan midweek meal.
ingredients: 2 tsp freshly chopped green bird’s-eye chillies (or to taste)
1 cauliflower, broken into florets, leaves chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
